author: swertz
body:
#### PR description:

- Drop the frozen nanoV10 configuration introduced in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39337 as we do not plan to support v10 in 13_0_X
   - Also remove v10 workflows from the matrix
   - Simplify the triggerObjectTableProducer as backward-compatibility with the v10 config is no longer needed
- Make the triggerObjectTable more easily customizable with eras/modifers by making the object selection a `PSet` instead of a `VPSet`
- Add back Run2-specific jet trigger object filters for Run2 only, removed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39818
    - This required removing the `run2_HLTconditions_2018` modifier from the `Run3` era. From a quick search I don't expect this to have unwanted effects elsewhere (not that this relates to the discussion in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/39958 as this is not the first time we need to introduces a different behaviour for Run2 vs. Run3 for things that were blindly inherited from the `Run2_2018` era to the `Run3` era, see e.g. https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40209). @lathomas  FYI, it meant that the L1 prefiring weights applied in nanoAODv10 to Run3 samples were taken as the 2018UL ones (and still are in nanoV11 in 12_6_X), which is probably incorrect.

#### PR validation:

Ran nano matrix workflows.
title: Nano: drop frozen V10 config, make triggerObjectTable more easily customizable
